body.name: Baby Montessori Toys for 1 2 3 4 Year Old, Wooden Toddler Shape Sorting Toys for Kids Age 3-4, Educational Farm Game Gift for Boys and Girls 1 2 3 4 Year Old

features: Safe Wooden Montessori Toys: This toddler montessori toy is made of high quality and sturdy thick pine wood, with polished edges and non-toxic water-based paint, satisfying baby's need for fun learning with the guarantee of safety and quality!

Help Develop Motor Skills: By pulling the carrot, matching the fruit shape, or catching worms with the rabbit, kids can improve motor skills and hand-eye coordination while having fun, a great educational toy for 2-4 year old baby boys and girls!

Educational Toys & Games: This wooden toy set includes 12 fruit blocks, 8 carrots, 10 cute worms, and a five-sided cart with different shapes and structures. Toddlers can play fruit & color recognition, shape matching and so on when playing the game!

Happy Carrot Harvest Time: Invite the baby's friends or play with your little one, start a happy farm harvest orchard cart game, promoting friendship between babies and parent-child relationship, great preschool learning toys for 2 3 4 year old!

Great Gift Idea for Toddlers: This toddler montessori toys come with exclusive package box, perfect birthday gifts for boys and girls 1 2 3 4 year old, great Christmas gifts for toddlers age 1-3 2-4. Give kids an engaging option for screen-free fun!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The TOHIBEE Multifunctional Orchard Cart Wooden Toys set Includes Everything Baby Need for A Fun-filled Day! Kids play carrots,fruit gathering, rabbits catch insects, Pulling toys car, etc. A variety of game methods can make babies happier.

Train Kid‘s Hand-eye Coordination How interesting it is for rabbits to catch insects! Develop Kid's Color Recognition, Fruit Recognition Abilities Luxury wooden toys set include 12 PCS colorful fruit blocks Exercise Kid's the Fine Motor Skill Invite your baby's friends to play the carrot game, and then put the harvested carrot and fruits in the net bag, which is really interesting!

Cultivate Good Storage Habits from Childhood Multifunctional orchard cart wooden toy set with storage net bag. After kids finished the playing game, they could perfectly put all the pieces of fruit, worms, rabbit and carrots into the net bag, so as to achieve the effect of cultivating good storage habits from childhood.multifunctionalmultifunctional.

Best Gifts for Your Little One ! TOHIBEE montessori toys with colorful designs and beautifully packaged, which is ideal gifts for 2 3 4 year old boys girls, such as birthday gifts, easter gifts, holiday presents, Christmas gifts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun activity for my toddler
reviews.reviewText: My toddler loved it. She was able to work on the different shapes and sizes. Kept her entertained

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Attractive, creative way to teach sewing basics
reviews.reviewText: This is a sweet lacing material to teach my children sewing basics! Most sewing activities are just 1 piece. This swt has several animals with three pieces (a head, body and accessory) so they can lean how to begin sewing one piece on to another. The colors are beautiful, the quality of the laces is very good (the ends are sturdy so they lace through the holes well). My daughter was immediately attracted to the cuteness of the animals. I am excited to use this with her more and more! I have almost 3 year old and my almost 5 year old seems interested in it, too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This is my first shopping with TOHIBEE. Very much satisfied with the product. Exactly matches the product description. Activity skills of a child can be gradually improved as we can do many things using one product. The young kids can just match two pieces appropriately to form the desired animal shape. Then they can use the lacing technique to join two pieces. It's pretty interesting for the young minds to join two pieces by sewing using laces. Also, it includes accessories for each animal like bone etc as a surprise element. It kindles the child's innovative skills. It's very colorful and very much attractive for the children. Its lightweight , easy to carry to go activity. It's very sturdy and durable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Educational, fun, and a hit with children
reviews.reviewText: The Tohibee sewing cards surpassed my expectations! They are sewing boards instead of flimsy cards! In my career as a teacher, I am amazed at the educational value of these cards. In a few words: educational: great for fine motor skills and building both the left and right sides of the brain; fun: bright colors and varied sewing options to hold interest, durable: thick, wooden cards, quality boards, and string! I highly recommend these sewing cards!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I like the product for it's sturdiness, it's colored well and will help with the small motor skills. My one complaint would be the lack of instructions. My grandson is a visual learner just like me. It would help to have pictures of each finished item for him to look at and copy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Recommended for Vision Therapy
reviews.reviewText: Our daughter's eye Dr. recommended we get her some sewing cards for Vision Therapy at home. Poking the strings in and out of the holes works on depth perception and other areas that her eyes are weak in. After reviewing several sewing cards I chose these because they were affordable, small in size for easy storage, and sturdy. There is also an added challenge to the cards because you have to "sew" the top of the card to the bottom. This step takes some coordination but is great for an added challenge. My daughter is 7 so these cards are perfect for her. Younger ages may require some help from the parent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my four year old and she honestly loves them! I had gotten some from target dollar spot a while ago and they were cardboard and started to bend and break. These are sturdy, come with lots of different clothes, and are perfect for quiet time while her little twin siblings are sleeping! She actually said “thank you so much mom!” When I handed it to her she was very excited. I think the quality exceeds the price— This is not a paid review and not sponsored in any way— just glad to find an affordable product that’s good quality to keep my girl’s hands busy!
